thread.title: Licht Building Services
thread.title_full: Appliance Testing Supplies reviewed by Licht Building Services

author: Licht Building Services
title: Licht Building Services
text:
The staff and trainers were excellent with the crash coarse in test and tag.
Later I contacted them to purchase a machine the follow up advise when I needed it was promp and freindly.
Thankyou I would not hesitate to recommend this company to anyone.
Cheers
John
